text: Bergkamen is a town in the district of Unna, in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. It is near the river Lippe, approx. 15 km north-east of Dortmund and 15 km south-west of Hamm. Bergkamen, a German town in the East part of the Ruhrgebiet and south of the Münsterland, was founded in 1966 by the merging of at first five smaller communities. ==Twin towns== * Hettstedt, since 1990 * Taşucu, since 1994 * Gennevilliers, since 1995 * Wieliczka, since 1995 ==References== == Other websites == * Official Website of the city of Bergkamen * Website of the mayor of Bergkamen Category:Unna (district)
title: Bergkamen
